stove.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a piece of kitchen equipment on which you cook food in pots and pans, and that contains an oven
stove.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: a pot of soup simmering on the stove
stove.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a thing used for heating a room or for cooking, which works by burning wood, coal, oil, or gas
stove.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a past tense and past participle of stave2
